languages.text: {n}Брови Соломона ползут вверх, на губах появляется тень улыбки.{/n} "Впервые кто-то берется меня защищать, но... мне приятно". {n}Откинувшись на подушку, он тихо произносит:{/n} "Знаешь, возможно, от этого кровавого ужаса действительно способ{mf|ен|на} меня защитить только ты".

{n}Solomorne's eyebrows creep upward, the shadow of a smile appearing on his lips.{/n} "This is the first time someone has ever offered to protect me, but... it feels good." {n}Leaning back against the pillow, he speaks softly,{/n} "You know, maybe the only one who can truly protect me from this bloody horror is you."
languages.original_text: {n}Брови Соломона ползут вверх, на губах появляется тень улыбки.{/n} "Впервые кто-то берется меня защищать, но... мне приятно". {n}Откинувшись на подушку, он тихо произносит:{/n} "Знаешь, возможно, от этого кровавого ужаса действительно способ{mf|ен|на} меня защитить только ты".

{n}Solomorne's eyebrows creep upward, the shadow of a smile appearing on his lips.{/n} "This is the first time someone has ever offered to protect me, but... it feels good." {n}Leaning back against the pillow, he speaks softly,{/n} "You know, maybe the only one who can truly protect me from this bloody horror is you."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne hausse les sourcils et l'ombre d'un sourire se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « C'est bien la première fois que quelqu'un propose de me protéger, mais... je dois dire que c'est agréable. » {n}Il s'adosse à l'oreiller et continue d'une voix douce :{/n} « En y réfléchissant bien, vous êtes peut-être {mf|le seul|la seule} à être réellement capable de me protéger de cette horreur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyebrows creep upward, the shadow of a smile appearing on his lips.{/n} "This is the first time someone has ever offered to protect me, but... it feels good." {n}Leaning back against the pillow, he speaks softly,{/n} "You know, maybe the only one who can truly protect me from this bloody horror is you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne hausse les sourcils et l'ombre d'un sourire se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « C'est bien la première fois que quelqu'un propose de me protéger, mais... je dois dire que c'est agréable. » {n}Il s'adosse à l'oreiller et continue d'une voix douce :{/n} « En y réfléchissant bien, vous êtes peut-être {mf|le seul|la seule} à être réellement capable de me protéger de cette horreur. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの眉がわずかに上がり、唇にかすかな微笑みの影が浮かんだ。{/n}「誰かに守ってもらえるなんて、これが初めてです…でも、悪くないですね」{n}枕にもたれながら、彼は静かに続けた。{/n}「この忌まわしい地獄から本当に私を守ることができるのは、あなたしかいないのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyebrows creep upward, the shadow of a smile appearing on his lips.{/n} "This is the first time someone has ever offered to protect me, but... it feels good." {n}Leaning back against the pillow, he speaks softly,{/n} "You know, maybe the only one who can truly protect me from this bloody horror is you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの眉がわずかに上がり、唇にかすかな微笑みの影が浮かんだ。{/n}「誰かに守ってもらえるなんて、これが初めてです…でも、悪くないですね」{n}枕にもたれながら、彼は静かに続けた。{/n}「この忌まわしい地獄から本当に私を守ることができるのは、あなたしかいないのかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne arquea ligeramente las cejas y empieza a sonreír.{/n} «Es la primera vez que alguien se ofrece a protegerme y... sienta bien». {n}Inclinándose contra la almohada, continúa en voz baja:{/n} «¿Sabe? Es posible que la única persona que realmente pueda protegerme de este horror tan espantoso sea usted».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyebrows creep upward, the shadow of a smile appearing on his lips.{/n} "This is the first time someone has ever offered to protect me, but... it feels good." {n}Leaning back against the pillow, he speaks softly,{/n} "You know, maybe the only one who can truly protect me from this bloody horror is you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne arquea ligeramente las cejas y empieza a sonreír.{/n} «Es la primera vez que alguien se ofrece a protegerme y... sienta bien». {n}Inclinándose contra la almohada, continúa en voz baja:{/n} «¿Sabe? Es posible que la única persona que realmente pueda protegerme de este horror tan espantoso sea usted».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的眉毛向上抽动着，嘴角露出一丝微笑。{/n}“这还是第一次有人说要保护我，但……这种感觉很好。”{n}他靠在在枕头上，轻声开了口。{/n}“你知道吗？或许真正能保护我，让我不再被这一切该死的恐怖折磨的人，只有你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyebrows creep upward, the shadow of a smile appearing on his lips.{/n} "This is the first time someone has ever offered to protect me, but... it feels good." {n}Leaning back against the pillow, he speaks softly,{/n} "You know, maybe the only one who can truly protect me from this bloody horror is you."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的眉毛向上抽动着，嘴角露出一丝微笑。{/n}“这还是第一次有人说要保护我，但……这种感觉很好。”{n}他靠在在枕头上，轻声开了口。{/n}“你知道吗？或许真正能保护我，让我不再被这一切该死的恐怖折磨的人，只有你。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un kaşları hayretle kalkıyor, dudaklarında hayal meyal bir gülümseme geziniyor.{/n} "İlk kez birinden bunu duyuyorum ama hoşuma gitti." {n}Sırtını yastığına yaslayıp yumuşak bir sesle konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Belki de beni bu dehşetten koruyabilecek tek kişi sensindir."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyebrows creep upward, the shadow of a smile appearing on his lips.{/n} "This is the first time someone has ever offered to protect me, but... it feels good." {n}Leaning back against the pillow, he speaks softly,{/n} "You know, maybe the only one who can truly protect me from this bloody horror is you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un kaşları hayretle kalkıyor, dudaklarında hayal meyal bir gülümseme geziniyor.{/n} "İlk kez birinden bunu duyuyorum ama hoşuma gitti." {n}Sırtını yastığına yaslayıp yumuşak bir sesle konuşmaya devam ediyor. {/n} "Belki de beni bu dehşetten tek koruyabilecek kişi de sensindir."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne hebt die Augenbrauen und der Hauch eines Lächelns umspielt seine Lippen.{/n} "Das ist das erste Mal, dass jemand anbietet, mich zu beschützen, aber ... es fühlt sich gut an." {n}Er lässt sich in das Kissen sinken und sagt mit sanfter Stimme:{/n} "Wisst Ihr, vielleicht könnt nur Ihr mich wirklich vor diesem verdammten Albtraum beschützen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyebrows creep upward, the shadow of a smile appearing on his lips.{/n} "This is the first time someone has ever offered to protect me, but... it feels good." {n}Leaning back against the pillow, he speaks softly,{/n} "You know, maybe the only one who can truly protect me from this bloody horror is you."

[Er lässt sich in das Kissen sinken und sagt mit sanfter Stimme:{n} "Wisst Ihr, vielleicht könnt nur Ihr mich wirklich vor diesem verdammten Albtraum beschützen."
